item.title: The number of active addresses on #Tron is 2.48M, ranking #1 among all chains.
item.description: The number of active addresses on #Tron is 2.48M, ranking #1 among all chains.

item.title: Hyperliquid Launches LINEA U Perpetual Swap Contract with Up to 3x Leverage
item.description: On September 1st, according to the official website, Hyperliquid has launched the LINEA/USDC perpetual contract, with a maximum leverage of 3x.

item.title: CoinShares: Digital asset investment products saw net inflows of $2.48 billion last week
item.description: On September 1st, CoinShares issued its latest weekly report which indicated that the digital asset market witnessed a capital inflow of $2.48 billion last week. As a result, the total inflow for August reached $4.37 billion. Currently, the year-to-date inflow amounts to $35.5 billion. However, the assets under management (AUM) have decreased by 10% to $219 billion.In the United States, the largest inflow was $2.29 billion. Switzerland, Germany, and Canada also witnessed growth. This suggests that the outflows last Friday were mainly driven by profit-taking.

item.title: Binance HODLer Airdrop Launches Somnia (SOMI)
item.description: September 1st. According to the official announcement, the Binance HODLer Airdrop has now initiated its 35th project - Somnia (SOMI). It is an EVM L1 blockchain focusing on consumer-facing applications like gaming and entertainment products.From August 12th, 2025, 08:00 to August 16th, 2025, 07:59 (UTC+8), users who used BNB to subscribe to Capital Protected Yield Farming (Fixed-Term and/or Flexible) or on-chain Staking products will receive the airdrop allocation. The HODLer airdrop information is anticipated to become live within 24 hours, and the new tokens will be delivered to users' spot wallets at least 1 hour prior to the start of trading.Binance will list SOMI on September 2nd, 2025, at 22:30 (UTC+8) and open trading pairs for USDT, USDC, BNB, FDUSD, and TRY in accordance with the Seed Label Trading Rule. The SOMI deposit channel will open on September 1st, 2025, at 19:00 (UTC+8).

item.title: Participate in the GSR or WLFI second-round public sale, invest 2 million USDC at a cost of $0.05 per token
item.description: September 1st. According to the monitoring of on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), 7 months ago, an address beginning with 0x453 transferred 2 million USDC to the WLFI fundraising address and received 40 million tokens. The cost price was $0.05. The source of funds for this address was GSR.It remains unclear whether GSR Markets is participating in the investment as an institution or will provide market-making services. No official multisig-related transfers have been observed at this time.

item.title: ZhongAn Smart Living: Collaboration with a Licensed Virtual Asset Trading Platform in Hong Kong
item.description: On September 1st, ZhongAn Smart Living (02271.HK) announced that it will cooperate with a licensed virtual asset operating platform in Hong Kong. This platform will offer digital asset infrastructure support to ZhongAn Smart Living, enabling it to explore the path of cryptocurrency asset custody and allocation within the regulatory framework and promote the construction of an innovative digital ecosystem.Meanwhile, the platform will also provide technical advice on the virtual asset platform and support for compliance pathways and establish a regular technical discussion and business exchange mechanism. This collaboration is intended to strengthen ZhongAn Smart Living's existing business foundation, enhance its core competitiveness, and drive business innovation and digital transformation.

item.title: LINEA's pre-market trading price on Binance is currently at $0.051, with a fully diluted valuation of $3.672 billion.
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, the pre-trading price of LINEA on Binance is currently at $0.051.Binance's official announcement indicates that the total supply of LINEA tokens is 72,009,990,000, and the corresponding fully diluted valuation is $36.72 billion.

item.title: Binance will launch LINEA Perpetual Futures Pre-trading User Contract.
item.description: September 1st. According to an official announcement, the Binance Futures platform will commence LINEAUSDT perpetual contract trading at 16:30 on September 1, 2025 (in UTC+8 time zone), and the maximum leverage offered will be up to 5x.

item.title: OKX will delist WBTC, JST, BTT, ERN, GLMR, and MOVR spot trading on September 8th.
item.description: September 1st. As per an official announcement, OKX announced that it will officially remove the WBTC, JST, BTT, ERN, GLMR, and MOVR trading pairs on September 8th, 2025, from 4:00 to 6:00 p.m. (Beijing time). Users who have open orders for the above trading pairs are required to cancel their orders before 4:00 p.m. on September 8th, 2025 (UTC+8). Failure to cancel orders in a timely manner will lead to automatic order cancellation.

item.title: Bitcoin's Market Cap Overtaken by Silver, Falling to 8th Among Global Mainstream Assets
item.description: On September 1st, based on data from 8 Market, with Bitcoin briefly dipping below $118,000 today, its market capitalization has now dropped to $2.183 trillion. This value is lower than that of silver (with a market cap of $2.333 trillion), and Bitcoin now ranks as the 8th largest global asset.
